mapper.insert: insert into WISDOM.SQLPLUS_PRODUCT_PROFILE (PRODUCT, USERID, ATTRIBUTE, SCOPE, NUMERIC_VALUE, CHAR_VALUE, DATE_VALUE, LONG_VALUE) values (#{product,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numericValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{charValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateValue,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{longValue,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select PRODUCT, USERID, ATTRIBUTE, SCOPE, NUMERIC_VALUE, CHAR_VALUE, DATE_VALUE, LONG_VALUE from WISDOM.SQLPLUS_PRODUCT_PROFILE
